Title: Redeem Code
Description_EnterCode: Enter a valid code to be sent special items in your mail.
Description_CodePerPlayer: Once you have redeemed a code, you can't redeem it again.
Description_CodeValidation: Codes last for a specific time and are redeemed by a certain number of players.
Failed_AlreadyRedeemedCode: You cannot redeem this code again.
Sucess_CodeRedeemed: You have redeembed the code successfully. Check your mail to claim your items.
